attributes.action: To save the Ancient Ram Inn in Wotton-Under-Edge
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The sole purpose of this petition is to bring attention of this great building to the higher authorities and to help save it as sadly it is now falling apart and John alone cannot afford it's upkeep, let alone structural repairs. Please please help us Save The Ancient Ram Inn by signing the petition

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
